alert.note: Alert for Lee; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lee and southwestern St. Francis Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 302 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Salem, or near Palestine, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Madison, Palestine, Widener, Haynes, Brickeys, Cody, Gill, Bonair, Westor, Dansby, New Castle, Four Forks, Dodsons Corner, Heustess, Ball Point and Tongin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
